price: 7. Wij hebben nog (nooit zoiets) gehoord van dit volk van latere datum; dit is niets anders dan een verzinsel!”
arabic: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: mā samiʿ'nā bihādhā fī al-milati al-ākhirati in hādhā illā ikh'tilāqun
